title: Navigating Japan’s Rising Tourism: How to Avoid the Crowds
imageAlt: Orange torii gates forming a tunnel path
description: Did you know that Japan's tourism numbers are set to rise significantly in 2026, making popular spots busier than ever? This guide reveals lesser-known itineraries and timing strategies that let you experience Japan’s rich culture without fighting the crowds.
author: Davina Blake

title: What Makes Nice a Memorable Stop on European Trips
imageAlt: Hilltop village overlooking the blue ocean
description: Did you know that Nice offers panoramic views of the Mediterranean from its stunning Promenade des Anglais? Discover how the city's unique location on the French Riviera and vibrant cultural scene make it a standout stop on European itineraries.
author: Lisa Crow
